= The Editor =

This is the tool used to curate !IntAct information. A new version is being developed at the moment.

 * Current phase: Design.
 * [http://spreadsheets.google.com/pub?key=tLkHetwRlQlWu0Qxccpw23Q&output=html Check the progress] of the current Sprint.

= Issues and use cases =

Please, use the "Issues" section to submit the bugs you find or tell us about your use cases. You can use the following shortcuts:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/intact/issues/entry?template=Editor%20bug%20report Report a bug].
 * [http://code.google.com/p/intact/issues/entry?template=Curator%20use%20case Submit use case].
 * [http://code.google.com/p/intact/issues/entry?template=Editor%20mockup%20feedback General feedback]
